docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -ex; 	apt-get update; 	apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 		autoconf 		automake 		bzip2 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		imagemagick 		libbz2-dev 		libc6-dev 		libcurl4-openssl-dev 		libdb-dev 		libevent-dev 		libffi-dev 		libgdbm-dev 		libglib2.0-dev 		libgmp-dev 		libjpeg-dev 		libkrb5-dev 		liblzma-dev 		libmagickcore-dev 		libmagickwand-dev 		libmaxminddb-dev 		libncurses5-dev 		libncursesw5-dev 		libpng-dev 		libpq-dev 		libreadline-dev 		libsqlite3-dev 		libssl-dev 		libtool 		libwebp-dev 		libxml2-dev 		libxslt-dev 		libyaml-dev 		make 		patch 		unzip 		xz-utils 		zlib1g-dev 		# https://lists.debian.org/debian-devel-announce/2016/09/msg00000.html
docker.raw: RUN set -ex; 	apt-get update; 	apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 		autoconf 		automake 		bzip2 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		imagemagick 		libbz2-dev 		libc6-dev 		libcurl4-openssl-dev 		libdb-dev 		libevent-dev 		libffi-dev 		libgdbm-dev 		libglib2.0-dev 		libgmp-dev 		libjpeg-dev 		libkrb5-dev 		liblzma-dev 		libmagickcore-dev 		libmagickwand-dev 		libmaxminddb-dev 		libncurses5-dev 		libncursesw5-dev 		libpng-dev 		libpq-dev 		libreadline-dev 		libsqlite3-dev 		libssl-dev 		libtool 		libwebp-dev 		libxml2-dev 		libxslt-dev 		libyaml-dev 		make 		patch 		unzip 		xz-utils 		zlib1g-dev 		# https://lists.debian.org/debian-devel-announce/2016/09/msg00000.html

docker.args: # if we use just "apt-cache show" here, it returns zero because "Can't select versions from package 'libmysqlclient-dev' as it is purely virtual", hence the pipe to grep
docker.raw: $( # if we use just "apt-cache show" here, it returns zero because "Can't select versions from package 'libmysqlclient-dev' as it is purely virtual", hence the pipe to grep

docker.name: IF
docker.args: apt-cache show 'default-libmysqlclient-dev' 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^Version:'; then 				echo 'default-libmysqlclient-dev'; 			else 				echo 'libmysqlclient-dev'; 			fi 		) 	; 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
docker.raw: if apt-cache show 'default-libmysqlclient-dev' 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^Version:'; then 				echo 'default-libmysqlclient-dev'; 			else 				echo 'libmysqlclient-dev'; 			fi 		) 	; 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
